tool.name: Split peptide database
tool.command:
mkdir pi_fr_out && cd pi_fr_out && python '$__tool_directory__/pi_database_splitter.py' -i '$pipeptides' -p '$peptable' #for $strip in $strips #if not $strip.peptable_pattern or str($strip.peptable_pattern) in $peptable.element_identifier --intercept $strip.intercept --width $strip.fr_width --tolerance $strip.tolerance --amount $strip.fr_amount --prefix pisplit --picutoff $strip.picutoff #if $strip.reverse --reverse #end if #break #end if #end for
#if $deltacol --deltacol $deltacol #else if $deltacolpattern --deltacolpattern '$deltacolpattern' #end if #if $fdrcol --fdrcol $fdrcol --fdrcutoff $fdrcutoff #else if $fdrcolpattern --fdrcolpattern '$fdrcolpattern' --fdrcutoff $fdrcutoff #end if #if $maxlen --maxlen $maxlen #end if --minlen $minlen

param.name: pipeptides
param.label: Target peptides with pI and accession
param.help: First col accession, second sequence, third pI

param.name: peptable
param.label: Peptide table to determine pI shift from
param.help: Should have delta pI as a column

param.name: fdrcolpattern
param.label: FDR (q-value) column pattern in peptide table

param.name: fdrcol
param.label: FDR (q-value) column number in peptide table
param.help: Overrides column pattern if filled. First column is 1

param.name: fdrcutoff
param.help: Not used when no FDR column specified
param.label: FDR value cutoff for inclusion in shift determination

param.name: deltacolpattern
param.label: Delta pI column pattern in peptide table

param.name: deltacol
param.label: Delta pI column number in peptide table
param.help: Overrides column pattern if filled. First column is 1

param.name: minlen
param.label: Minimum length of peptide to include in split DB

param.name: maxlen
param.label: Max. length of peptide to include in split DB

param.name: peptable_pattern
param.label: Pattern to find correct peptide table for a strip, for when multiple peptide tables have different strips
param.help: Will match against peptide table's name. Leave blank for single peptide table or when using same strip in all tables

param.name: picutoff
param.label: delta-pI cutoff for inclusion in shift determination

tool.help: Creates a pI separated database collection from a pI-determined input file of peptide/protein mappings. Outputs one db for target, one for decoy.
